{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Claw orb | class = BlasterAmmo | game = Heretic | doomednum = 54 | spawnid = 37 | spawnname = T_WIMPYBLASTERAMMO }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→BlasterAmmo
 →[[Classes:BlasterHefty|BlasterHefty]]
Small orb of ten charges for the [[Classes:Blaster|dragon claw]]. They are sometimes dropped by [[Classes:Wizard|disciples of D'Sparil]] and by [[Classes:Ironlich|iron liches]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BlasterAmmo : {{Class|Ammo}} { {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_AMMOBLASTER1" {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 10 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 200 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 10 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 400 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "INAMBST" States { Spawn: AMB1 ABC 4 Loop } }
